com.cop4331.networking

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cop4331.networking.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    A Class that holds information about a Game

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Game.Builder
      BUILDER Pattern Allows various settings to be applied to a Game before construction Class that allows a Game to be built
      static interface  Game.ShotListener
      OBSERVER pattern Listener that provides callbacks for queries on the Game's shots

      • isGameCreator

        public boolean isGameCreator()
        Checks if the current Account is the one that created the Game
        Returns:
        true if the logged in user created the Game, otherwise false

      • getGameCompleted

        public boolean getGameCompleted()
        Checks if the game has been completed
        Returns:
        true if the game has been completed, otherwise false

      • pickWinner

        public void pickWinner(User winner)
                throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Allows the Game's creator to pick the Game's winner
        Parameters:
        winner - the winner of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - thrown when the current Account is not the creator of the Game

      • getWinner

        public User getWinner()
        Gets the winner of the game
        Returns:
        a User object containing the winner of the game. If there is no winner, then null is returned
